actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the exception to the treatment of consolidated groups under the personal holding company rules.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to personal holding company rules, to repeal certain exceptions to the treatment of consolidated groups of corporations under such rules.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the exception to the treatment of consolidated groups under the personal holding company rules.
